name: 陳香君
objective:
本課程之設計，在介紹學生資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。本課程包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
This course is designed to provide students with the knowledge and techniques essential in information security. The topics to be covered include: introductions to information security, conventional encryption, private key technologies, public key technologies and hash functions, message authentication code and protocols, authentication systems, Kerberos, X.509 7, E-Mail security, PGP, S/MIME, IP security, Web security, SHTTP, SSL (Secure Session Layer), system security, and firewall systems.
